title: Bela Vista Futebol Clube
text:
Bela Vista Futebol Clube is a <a href="Brazilian%20Football%20League%20Teams">Brazilian football team</a> from the city of <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Gon%C3%A7alo%2C%20Rio%20de%20Janeiro">São Gonçalo</a>, <a href="Rio%20de%20Janeiro%20%28state%29">Rio de Janeiro state</a>, founded on May 10, 1977 in the city of <a href="Niter%C3%B3i">Niterói</a>.
Stadium.
The home stadium <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Municipal%20Alziro%20Almeida">Alziro Almeida</a> has a capacity of 4,000 people. The stadium is also known as "Alzirão".
Colors.
The official colors are <a href="red">red</a> and <a href="white">white</a>.
